Name: Poker Hands
About the game: A relaxing puzzle game where you combine neighboring cards to form poker hands. Use your arrow keys to move the cards. When two cards touch, they merge into one! 50 Levels that will challenge you to form different poker hands; Designed for experienced poker players and newcomers alike (you do not need to know how to play poker to enjoy this game!); Original Soundtrack, composed specially for this game;
Meta Title: Poker Hands: Mar 26, 2020, Minimol Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Poker Hands? Check out the release date (Mar 26, 2020), developer insights from Minimol Games, and a complete game summary.
